skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Heal Reduction] debuff. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 3 turns equal to 30% of the damage inflicted.

skills.desc: Places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 1 turn at the start of each Round. Places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 1 turn at the end of their turn.
